forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies this morning will become partly cloudy this afternoon. High 53F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low near 40F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of light rain later in the day. High 53F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 46F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 13C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High around 55F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 39F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 13C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High around 55F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 7C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 44F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 11C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 52F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 14C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 56F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 6C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 43F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 13C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 54F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then clearing overnight. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then clearing overnight. Low 41F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 14C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. High 57F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear evening skies will give way to mostly cloudy skies overnight. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear during the evening followed by mostly cloudy skies overnight. Low 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 13C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 56F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 43F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 42F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
